thread.title: Ancient peoples come alive in Orkney, Scotland
thread.title_full: Ancient peoples come alive in Orkney, Scotland - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Maureen Barnato
title: Ancient peoples come alive in Orkney, Scotland
text:
Photo: Courtesy Maureen Barnato Maureen Barnato and husband, Bill Pelter, of El Sobrante at the cliffs of Yesnaby in the Orkneys, Scotland. Maureen Barnato and husband, Bill Pelter, of El Sobrante at the...
Why I went: We’re interested in the lives of ancient peoples. But the August 2014 National Geographic article “Before Stonehenge” was the deciding factor. Maureen Barnato and husband, Bill Pelter, of El Sobrante at the cliffs of Yesnaby in the Orkneys, Scotland. Maureen Barnato and husband, Bill Pelter, of El Sobrante at the...
